AI Description: Skewer is a fast and accurate adapter trimmer for next-generation sequencing paired-end reads. It analyzes the patterns of quality scores at the ends of reads and identifies the beginning of the adapter sequences with high sensitivity and specificity.
Core Features: Adapter Trimming, Paired-End Reads Processing, Quality Score Analysis, High Sensitivity & Specificity
General Tags: Ngs Analysis, Bioinformatics, Sequence Data Processing, Adapter Trimming
